content: this second volume covers all the conventional topics of international monetary theory and openeconomy macroeconomics and a lot more besides gandolfo treats such further concepts as the theory of monetary integration and the european monetary union foreign exchange crises and the tobin tax theory of games and international policy coordinationit follows the twotier structure of the first volume and thanks to its selfcontained treatment may equally be used as a reference book
title: international economics ii international monetary theory and openeconomy macroeconomics
